synopsis: Bem, Baro, and Bera have moved to a new city & Baro must conceal his true monster identity. Baro befriends Kira and must protect her from a devouring monster even if it means revealing his true identity

Desiring to be freed of his accursed duties, the God of Death nabs ten people in a quest to bring back ten billion souls to Hell. Kira tries to reach out to Baro but she is kidnapped and may be taken to Hell forever

A spooky romantic werewolf in search of his former lover gets a kick out of preying on young women. Thinking that she is his lover, the brute falls for Berra. She must destroy the monster before he devours her and other innocent humans

A treacherous harpy monster consumes abused animals with a hate for mankind. Baro's new friend Mitsuki befriends a mysterious parrot that is taken by the beast and Baro must destroy the monster even if it means showing his true self

A ghoulishly creepy monster haunts the pediatric hospital, making every sick and injured child worse. After injuring his leg in a soccer game, the meddling Sora is admitted into the hospital and believes that the monster is Baro

New student Kendo makes a dubious pact with an evil monster who promises to revive his dead sister if he offers a human sacrifice. Kendo decides to kidnap Kira and now Baro must be the one to rescue her

Bem & Berra learn from their dying master that two sickly strangers who will do whatever it takes to stay alive and keep their humanoid strengths. Bem, Baro, and Berra must defeat the two hunters to stay alive
A mysterious sewer monster is kidnapping people and hiding them in his secret lair. Bem, Berro, & Berra hunt down the beast without the city knowing that they are actually monsters themselves
An eerie fortune-teller monster steals the source of happiness from women, gaining her power from the misfortune of humanity
Two banks are robbed by a group of monsters bent on retrieving the treasures that were taken from them
An evil art dealer owns a painting that kills all those who look at it. Kira and Baro investiate the gallery only to learn that the killer painting will be hung in Kira's father's hospital
The boyfriend of Kaido's crush accidentally purchases a monster shaped like a guitar. Bem, Baro, and Berra must defeat the shape changing monster to stop the impending destruction
A group of men working on a railway project are kidnapped by a minotaur angered that his home has been destroyed. Baro must save the men from harm even if it means revealing to Sora his true identity

A strange series of crimes seem to be linked to a black dog monster taking advantage of humans by convincing them it has has only three days to live. The monster attacks Mitsuki, and Baro must help the monster before it's too late
The geeky Mamoru seeks revenge on bullies by unleashing a mischievous monster. While investigating the creature at Kira's school, Baro is mistaken as an exchange student

Nostalgic over old movies, Sora' grandfather heads to a classic movie theater. Under the trance of a monster helping the theater owner he and many other elderly people are trapped in a bizarre movie ritual

A monster named Rose seeks immortality by donating umbrellas to her victims during rainstorms. The umbrellas are not what they seem and devour human's essence. Former enemies, Berra must defeat Rose in order to save more lives

A spider creature and a Succubus love to devour humans and are seeking to add Bem, Baro, and Berra to their evil team by delving into their history. The mystery of Bem's creation startles the three heroes

The police detective is hot on Baro's trail using the help of an exorcist to track him. While visiting a newly opened haunted house, Baro, Mitsuki, Kira, and Sora realize that there really is something to be scared of
Humans have gone missing at sea by the hands of an evil monster. Baro is invited on a boat trip with Kira's family with Sora & Mitsuki only to come face to face with the evil sea monster

Bay City's future is dark due to pollution and overall lack of respect for the environment. A group of evil monsters mirroring Bem, Baro, & Berra wreck havoc around the city making the three heroes appear as villains

A group of men want to destroy the Holy forest but the mayor will not approve the measure. Evil monsters seek to kill the mayor and pass the proposed demolition. Bem finds out that Darnhocia is behind the madness

The police have finally caught up to the dark monsters torturing the city and creating mayhem. Kira desperately hopes that Baro is not responsible for the chaos that has been causing the city to panic
A case is being built against the jailed evil monsters. The detective, who once thought Baro was evil, now believes that the monster was trying to save him in a past battle
Kira and her friends search for Baro hoping that he is still alive. Bem, Baro, and Berra must leave the sewer to fight Darnhocia, save mankind, and prove to the humans that they are indeed friendly

Tensions build as the city's police force rounds up all the monsters, imprisoning them with new found technology. The police officer that once hunted Bem, Baro, and Berra now believes that they should be spared as the city nears chaos
